name: FreeWill
description: Our mission is to enable you to do the most good for the people and causes you love, by providing free access to will-making services. We've partnered with 1800+ nonprofits and businesses who support our mission and help ensure you can create a will for free, while raising more than $10.7B+ in bequests to charities. Estate planning services: - Will & Trust - Beneficiary Designations - Advance Healthcare Directives & HIPPA Authorization - Financial Power of Attorney - Charitable Stock Gifts - Cha
